scripts.test:docker: yarn prepare-sample-tar && cat sample-package/package.tar.gz | docker run -i --name pre-runner -v prerunner-$(git rev-parse --short HEAD):/package repo.int.scp.ovh/scramjet/pre-runner:$npm_package_version
scripts.clean:docker: docker rm -f pre-runner; docker volume rm prerunner-$(git rev-parse --short HEAD)
